Identification_Area.title: Planetary Image Conversion Task -- Final Report (JPL 85-50)

Citation_Information.author_list: Martin, Michael D.; Stanley, Carol L.; Laughlin, Gaylin.
Citation_Information.description:
Postmortem report on the Planetary Image Conversion Task, a 1983-1984 effort, primarily conducted at JPL, to convert JPL's archive of planetary images to standard formats and write them to more stable storage media. This project included all Viking Orbiter EDRs. We have included it to help provide context on the history and provenance of the data, including possible sources of artifacts, errors, glitches, or gaps.
We copied this document from the NASA Technical Reports Server and converted it from PDF to PDF/A. The text is unchanged.

Modification_Detail.description: Copied file from NASA Technical Reports Server and converted to PDF/A.
